dcterms:creator: E. Piette
D.J.N.J. Soemers
M. Stephenson
C.F. Sironi
M.H.M. Winands
C. Browne
dcterms:description: The Ludii General Game System is a versatile platform that can run any game described in its ludemic game description format, allowing for the automatic inference of applicable optimised playout implementations based on game rules.
dcterms:title: Ludii General Game System

dcterms:creator: J. Kowalski
M. Maksymilian
J. Sutowicz
M. Szyku≈Ça
dcterms:description: The Regular Boardgames dataset includes a collection of games that can be used for testing and evaluating game-playing algorithms, particularly in the context of optimising game play.
dcterms:title: Regular Boardgames

dcterms:creator: T. Raiko
J. Peltonen
dcterms:description: The Connection Games dataset includes games like Hex and Y, which are used to demonstrate the application of UCT search algorithms in game playing.
dcterms:title: Connection Games

dcterms:creator: C. Browne
M. Stephenson
E. Piette
D.J.N.J. Soemers
dcterms:description: The Games in Ludii dataset encompasses a wide variety of games that can be played using the Ludii General Game System, providing a practical introduction to the system's capabilities.
dcterms:title: Games in Ludii
